values: God’s Wrath: “Vengeance Is Mine, I Will Repay,” Says the LordGod’s Wrath: “Vengeance Is Mine, I Will Repay,” Says the Lord

God’s wrath is more horrifying than we can ever imagine, but he will pardon any who take refuge in the shelter Jesus provides. God’s wrath is more horrifying than we can ever imagine, but he will pardon any who take refuge in the shelter Jesus provides.
